response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to us and is worth $1,200,000 to you, based on its unique features and benefits tailored to meet your specific needs. I understand the importance of finding the right price that aligns with both our business objectives and your financial considerations.

To facilitate this transaction and ensure a mutually beneficial outcome, I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This represents a significant saving of $100,000 compared to its full value, providing you with exceptional savings while securing a high-quality asset.

Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations, and we can proceed with the details of the transaction. I am committed to ensuring a smooth and satisfactory process for you.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1100000}
